entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023
